commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Joint Transfer Pricing Forum#E00951#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=951#Member#C#Platform for Tax Good Governance, Aggressive Tax Planning and Double Taxation#E02897#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2897#Member#C
goals__remit: The BEPS Monitoring Group is a network of specialists on international taxation, supported by by tax justice organisations, concerned especially with the effects of international taxation on development. Its aim is to produce reports relating to the reform of the international system for the taxation of transnational corporations, with a special focus on the Tax Declaration of the G20 world leaders and the  OECD’s BEPS Action Plan.
